Description

    Methods in org.springframework.boot.web.server.servlet.context that return ServletWebServerFactory
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    protected ServletWebServerFactory
    ServletWebServerApplicationContext.getWebServerFactory()
    Returns the ServletWebServerFactory that should be used to create the embedded WebServer.
